description: This service performs real-time bank account verification using the penny drop method, which validates account details by initiating a small transaction to verify account existence and holder information. It confirms account validity, retrieves account holder's full name, bank details, branch information, and ensures seamless payment processing and fraud prevention for banking and fintech applications.
llm_summary: Bank AC Verification (Penny Drop) validates bank account details through real-time penny drop transactions. Returns account status, holder name verification, bank branch details, and MICR code for secure payment processing and fraud prevention in banking workflows.
use_cases: Real-time bank account verification for payment processing platforms.
Account holder name verification for fraud prevention and compliance.
Validation of beneficiary accounts before fund transfers and payments.
KYC compliance for banking and financial services onboarding.
Verification of vendor and supplier bank details for corporate payments.
Account validation for loan disbursement and EMI collection setup.
Customer bank account verification for e-commerce and marketplace platforms.
Bulk account verification for payroll and salary processing systems.
